cause.description:
The online Distributed Proofreaders community at www.pgdp.net creates accurate, useful, free electronic editions of public domain books and magazines. We preserve history one page at a time.
1. Public Domain texts should be preserved and made available on line.
2. Electronic text is more useful than pictures of pages.
3. Community is what makes our work possible.
cause.mission: Accurately transcribe printed public domain material to electronic text
cause.name: Distributed Proofreaders
